name: Bonfire Classic
long_description: Bonfire Classic is a federated microblogging platform, designed with an emphasis on empowering users to create and manage their networks through our circles and boundaries features. These tools allow for more tailored content moderation and fosters deep, substantive discussions, distinguishing it from other social media platforms. The app offers a range of customizable settings, some of them specifically designed to empower users in counteracting common 'dark patterns' in digital platforms. These settings include the ability to disable infinite scrolling, and the option to conceal reaction counts and notification indicators. This functionality is intended to support a healthier, more controlled digital experience, reducing the potential for compulsive usage and distraction. Bonfire Classic is meant for those users and communities who need a solid, minimal and accessible entrypoint to the fediverse.
description: A customizable federated social network, to follow people, make posts, have discussion, etc...

name: Bonfire Community
description: A federated social network for communities, to organise in groups, discuss around topics, etc...
long_description: The Bonfire Community app is designed for groups seeking to expand their online interaction beyond the scope of microblogging. This App facilitates enhanced coordination of activities, discussions within specific groups, and the implementation of more nuanced governance structures and role definitions. Key features of the Bonfire Community app include the introduction of 'Groups' and 'Topics.' 'Groups' allow users from various instances to engage in discussions, with the flexibility to set specific visibility and permission levels. On the other hand, 'Topics' provide a structured way to organize discussions, ensuring that different subjects are not conflated within the same group. This organizational approach helps maintain clarity and focus in community conversations.

name: Bonfire Cooperation
description: Federated and collaborative kanban and task list for p2p project coordination.
long_description: Bonfire Cooperation is an app designed for communities that require collaborative work solutions. It offers features for task assignment and progress tracking, enhancing teamwork efficiency. Utilizing an open economic vocabulary, Bonfire Cooperation empowers users with federated Kanban boards and task management systems. Our development roadmap includes a suite of tools aimed at enabling users and communities to organize their work effectively in a decentralized environment. This approach not only streamlines task coordination but also fosters a more cohesive and productive community workflow.

name: Open Science
description: Mutual aid tools for local communities, such as sharing needs and offers.
long_description: A massive adoption of federated protocols by academic institutions will help to boost open-science implementations and to include non-academic communities in the knowledge production process. We envision these implementations being crafted in the open, through a co-designing process that unites scientists, researchers, and activists. This collective effort will ensure that the developed features meet the meticulous standards of academic tools while leveraging the user experience of social networks. It is our aspiration that this will spark meaningful conversations and broaden the accessibility of scientific discussions to a wider audience, fostering a vibrant, inclusive, and interconnected global knowledge community.
